vulnerabilities.name: Policy violation found for cyclonedx-core-java
vulnerabilities.description:
Policy **High risk CVSS score** is in violation for the following reason(s):

- Found security vulnerability CVE-2024-38374 with severity >= 7 (severity = 7.5)
- Found security vulnerability CVE-2024-38374 with severity < 9 (severity = 7.5)

**Policy action**: FAIL
vulnerabilities.solution: Check the [vulnerability details page](https://sonatype.sonatype.app/platform/assets/index.html#/vulnerabilities/CVE-2024-38374) for more details about this issue and possible recommendations.
